function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global crises such as the COVID-19 pandemic and economic depression increase susceptibility to contagious diseases","Impact":"Heightened risk of further disease spread and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, investing in healthcare infrastructure, and promoting vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, telemedicine, and advanced healthcare equipment","People":"Global population, particularly vulnerable groups","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Nation-wide quarantines and lockdowns lead to economic impacts and social readjustment","Impact":"Economic downturn, job losses, and disruption of daily routines","Mitigation":"Supporting businesses and individuals financially, providing remote work opportunities, and offering mental health and social support services","Technologies":"Remote work tools, online financial assistance platforms, and mental health apps","People":"Workers, businesses, and individuals under quarantine","Owner":"Government, businesses, and mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Significant drops in energy and electricity demand due to pandemic-related closures","Impact":"Impact on energy sector earnings and potential disruptions in energy supply","Mitigation":"Investing in renewable energy, diversifying energy sources, and adapting energy infrastructure to changing demand patterns","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, energy storage technologies, and smart grid solutions","People":"Energy sector workers, consumers, and communities reliant on energy supply","Owner":"Energy companies, governments, and energy infrastructure providers"}]}
